articles.title: Elon Musk says he 'regrets' some of his posts about Donald Trump
articles.description: Musk posted a series of tweets on X last week in a fiery exchange between the pair.
articles.content:

articles.description: SINGAPORE: Ikea said on Wednesday (Jun 11) it is recalling a batch of garlic presses due to the risk of small metal pieces detaching during use. articles.title: NASA releases first observations from new PUNCH Sun telescope
articles.description: NASA's PUNCH mission unveils stunning first images of coronal mass ejections, capturing the Sun's explosive plasma eruptions in unprecedented detail. Presented at the 246th AAS meeting, these observations promise to improve space weather forecasting.

articles.title: Twix advert banned for encouraging dangerous driving
articles.description: ASA bans were given to Twix for encouraging dangerous driving and to Diesel clothing for an advert with Katie Price they found to be sexualising.
articles.content:

articles.title: Jail for chief cabin attendant who filmed female subordinate in hotel room toilet
articles.description: The man placed a mini camera in the toilet and covered it with a towel.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: An airline chief cabin attendant who placed a camera to record his female subordinate in her hotel room toilet in Singapore was handed four weeks' jail on Wednesday (Jun 11).
